Name: August 2025 Newsletter
Text:

Name: February 2025 Newsletter
Text:
Special Events

Name: July 2025 Newsletter

Name: March 2025 Newsletter
Text:
March at Golden Pond â€“ A Month of Celebration, Connection, and New Experiences!

As the first signs of spring bloom, Golden Pond Retirement Community is buzzing with excitement for a month full of engaging events, enriching experiences, and opportunities to connect. March brings a fantastic lineup of activities for our residents, from special luncheons and outings to a brand-new class that fosters creativity and personal growth. Plus, weâ€™re taking a moment to celebrate an unforgettable visit from some furry little friendsâ€”baby kangaroos!

Womenâ€™s Lunch â€“ March 13

Ladies, letâ€™s dine in style! Our Womenâ€™s Lunch on March 13 is the perfect time to gather, enjoy a delicious meal, and share laughter and stories with friends. Donâ€™t miss out on this delightful afternoon of good food and even better company!

Seasonâ€™s Buffet & Lodge Casino Outing â€“ March 19

Are you feeling lucky? Join us for a day of fun, food, and fortune at Seasonâ€™s Buffet & Lodge Casino on March 19. Whether youâ€™re a slot machine enthusiast or enjoy a lively table game, this trip is always a hit. Be sure to sign up at the front desk to reserve your spot!

New Class: Bloom & Grow â€“ March 20

Weâ€™re thrilled to introduce Bloom & Grow, a new class designed to spark creativity, foster connection, and inspire personal growth. Whether youâ€™re looking to pick up a new hobby or simply have fun with fellow residents, this class is for you. Our first session kicks off on March 20â€”sign up at the front desk to join in!

Monthly Resident Meeting â€“ Last Week of March

Your voice matters at Golden Pond! Stay informed, share your thoughts, and connect with fellow residents during our Monthly Resident Meeting in the last week of March. Stay tuned for the exact date and timeâ€”we canâ€™t wait to hear from you!

A Hopping Good Time: Baby Kangaroos Visit Golden Pond

Last month, Golden Pond was filled with excitement as residents and their families enjoyed a special visit from adorable baby kangaroos! The event was a heartwarming success, bringing joy, curiosity, and plenty of photo opportunities.

We extend our deepest gratitude to our Executive Director, Leigh, for making this magical experience happen, as well as to Keaton Crawford, the founder of the kangaroo ranch, for sharing these gentle, affectionate creatures with us. Residents had the chance to interact with and learn about the care and behaviors of these unique animals, making for an unforgettable experience.

Golden Pond is dedicated to bringing meaningful, engaging events to our residents, and this visit was a perfect example of the joy that comes with new experiences. We look forward to welcoming these furry friends back again soon!

Employee of the Month: David Slattery

We are thrilled to recognize David Slattery as our Employee of the Month! Since joining our Activities Department, David has brought energy, dedication, and a positive attitude to every event and interaction. His willingness to go above and beyond has made a lasting impact on both our team and residents. Thank you, David, for all you doâ€”your hard work does not go unnoticed!

Marching to a Healthy Beat â€“ Celebrating Nutrition Month

March is National Nutrition Month, a time to focus on healthier habits, from adding more fruits and vegetables to our diet to incorporating simple daily exercises. One great way to start is by trying quinoa, a superfood thatâ€™s packed with protein, potassium, and essential nutrients.

Did you know? Quinoa is not actually a grain! Itâ€™s closely related to beets and spinach, making it a powerhouse of nutrition. Whether in bread, pasta, or granola, adding quinoa to your diet is a great way to fuel your body with essential nutrients.
